text:
It’s unfortunate that my mom seek treatment with them for her backache.

After the tui na treatment by the 医师 on the 7th September 2023, she developed neck problem the next day. Her neck bend at 70° forward, with pain and discomfort when she tried to keep it upright.

Seeking recourse for TCM negligence is a lengthy process, or any medical recourse. I will not recommend this place for any back related tui na.

they have paynow, alot of people here to see tcm for dermatology. Result may defer for everyone, but my own skin condition improved and slowly recovered after taking the tcm medication and non steroid cream. Parking there is easy.
Me and my wife trying for a baby, end up the tcm ask my wife to go down buy their med once finish, and their med not cheap you know....each visit around 70 to 100+....
Been seeing Dr Zhao for over 16 years! Trusted physician that treats issues effectively.
